org.springframework.data.repository.support

接口 RepositoryInvoker

  • 所有超级接口:
    RepositoryInvocationInformation

    public interface RepositoryInvoker
extends RepositoryInvocationInformation
    API to invoke (CRUD) methods on Spring Data repository instances independently of the base interface they expose. Clients should check the availability of the methods before invoking them by using the methods of RepositoryInvocationInformation.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.10

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void invokeDeleteById(Object id)
      Invokes the method equivalent to CrudRepository.deleteById(Object).
      Iterable<Object> invokeFindAll(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Invokes the find-all method of the underlying repository using the method taking a Pageable as parameter if available (i.e. the equivalent to PagingAndSortingRepository.findAll(Pageable)), using the method taking a Sort if available (i.e. the equivalent to PagingAndSortingRepository.findAll(Sort) by extracting the Sort contained in the given Pageable) or the plain equivalent to CrudRepository.findAll().
      Iterable<Object> invokeFindAll(org.springframework.data.domain.Sort sort)
      Invokes the find-all method of the underlying repository using the method taking a Sort as parameter if available (i.e. the equivalent to PagingAndSortingRepository.findAll(Sort)) or the plain equivalent to CrudRepository.findAll().
      <T> Optional<T> invokeFindById(Object id)
      Invokes the method equivalent to CrudRepository.findById(Object).
      Optional<Object> invokeQueryMethod(Method method, MultiValueMap<String,? extends Object> parameters, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable, org.springframework.data.domain.Sort sort)
      Invokes the query method backed by the given Method using the given parameters, Pageable and Sort.
      <T> T invokeSave(T object)
      Invokes the method equivalent to CrudRepository.save(Object) on the repository.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.springframework.data.repository.support.RepositoryInvocationInformation

        hasDeleteMethod, hasFindAllMethod, hasFindOneMethod, hasSaveMethod

    • 方法详细资料

      • invokeSave

        <T> T invokeSave(T object)
        Invokes the method equivalent to CrudRepository.save(Object) on the repository.
        参数:
        object -
        返回:
        the result of the invocation of the save method
        抛出:
        IllegalStateException - if the repository does not expose a save method.

      • invokeFindById

        <T> Optional<T> invokeFindById(Object id)
        Invokes the method equivalent to CrudRepository.findById(Object).
        参数:
        id - must not be null.
        返回:
        the entity with the given id.
        抛出:
        IllegalStateException - if the repository does not expose a find-one-method.

      • invokeFindAll

        Iterable<Object> invokeFindAll(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        Invokes the find-all method of the underlying repository using the method taking a Pageable as parameter if available (i.e. the equivalent to PagingAndSortingRepository.findAll(Pageable)), using the method taking a Sort if available (i.e. the equivalent to PagingAndSortingRepository.findAll(Sort) by extracting the Sort contained in the given Pageable) or the plain equivalent to CrudRepository.findAll().
        参数:
        pageable - can be null.
        返回:
        the result of the invocation of the find-all method.
        抛出:
        IllegalStateException - if the repository does not expose a find-all-method.

      • invokeFindAll

        Iterable<Object> invokeFindAll(org.springframework.data.domain.Sort sort)
        Invokes the find-all method of the underlying repository using the method taking a Sort as parameter if available (i.e. the equivalent to PagingAndSortingRepository.findAll(Sort)) or the plain equivalent to CrudRepository.findAll().
        参数:
        pageable - can be null.
        返回:
        the result of the invocation of the find-all method.
        抛出:
        IllegalStateException - if the repository does not expose a find-all-method.

      • invokeDeleteById

        void invokeDeleteById(Object id)
        Invokes the method equivalent to CrudRepository.deleteById(Object). The given id is assumed to be of a type convertible into the actual identifier type of the backing repository.
        参数:
        id - must not be null.
        抛出:
        {@link - IllegalStateException} if the repository does not expose a delete-method.

      • invokeQueryMethod

        Optional<Object> invokeQueryMethod(Method method,
                                   MultiValueMap<String,? extends Object> parameters,
                                   org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable,
                                   org.springframework.data.domain.Sort sort)
        Invokes the query method backed by the given Method using the given parameters, Pageable and Sort.
        参数:
        method - must not be null.
        parameters - must not be null.
        pageable - must not be null.
        sort - must not be null.
        返回:
        the result of the invoked query method.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.11
